title: Fish cakes with sweet potato fries
description: These fish cakes are a great way of using up leftover mashed potatoes, get the kids to help with the cooking and they may never ask for fish fingers again.
ingredients: 2 x 160g tins of tuna or salmon, or 320g/11½oz smoked mackerel
50g/1¾oz puffed rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies)
